thread.section_title: Fancy Dress Ball Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fancy Dress Ball | www.fancydressball.co.uk | 4 of 605
thread.title: Carole
thread.title_full: Fancy Dress Ball reviewed by Carole

author: Carole
title: Carole
text:
I was very pleased with the outfit I had ordered. It only took a couple of days to arrive. I was amazed at the amount of different outfits I could choose from. I arrived at my nieces fancy dress party with confidence.
I would definitely order another outfit from this company.
Carole
